app.title: invideo AI: Video Generator
app.description:
invideo AI is the easiest app to create AI videos. This easy AI video maker that turns your ideas into engaging videos with ease. Simply enter your idea, and let invideo‚Äôs advanced AI video generator craft a complete video including a script, voiceover, media, and text. Whether you're aiming to make AI videos for social media, education, or marketing, this app acts as your personal AI video editor, ready to fine-tune any element to meet your needs.

Main Features:
‚Ä¢ Text to Video AI: Input a topic and our AI video creator will generate unique videos, automating the creation process to save you time.
‚Ä¢ AI Movie Maker: Craft longer-form content or cinematic stories with our powerful storytelling tools.
‚Ä¢ Detailed Customization: Leverage the versatile AI video editor to adjust the visuals, script or voiceover for your need.
‚Ä¢ Extensive AI Media Library: Access over 16 million stock media options, searchable through AI, ensuring it perfectly aligns with your video's theme.
‚Ä¢ Realistic AI Voiceovers: Choose from multiple natural-sounding voice options to enhance your videos.
‚Ä¢ AI Voice Cloning: Your videos sound exactly like you with your cloned voice! Save hours of recording, personalize your videos and be consistent.
‚Ä¢ Optimized Efficiency: As an AI video maker, this tool helps you save significant time and reduce production costs while increasing your content output.

Uses Cases of invideo AI:
‚Ä¢ Social Media Content: Generate compelling AI story videos and motivational AI reels that resonate on platforms like Instagram and YouTube.
‚Ä¢ Marketing Videos: Create AI videos and AI reels that captivate and inform, such as product highlights or content marketing videos.
‚Ä¢ Educational and How-To Videos: Produce tutorials or explainer videos with ease, from cooking guides to DIY repairs, using our text to AI video capabilities.

Simple Text Command Editing:
‚Ä¢ Creative Commands: Direct your video‚Äôs tone, from serious to humorous, or conclude with a dramatic finish.
‚Ä¢ Audio and Text Adjustments: Customize voiceovers, alter background music, and edit subtitles to match your video‚Äôs mood.
‚Ä¢ Visual and Pace Editing: Change scene visuals, adjust media pacing, or edit out entire segments to achieve your desired narrative flow.

Effortlessly Generate Videos: Start creating with invideo AI today and transform your creative ideas into professional-quality videos with just a few clicks. Whether you're a marketer, content creator, or business owner, invideo AI equips you with the tools to create impactful videos with minimal effort.

Terms of Use: https://invideo.io/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy Policy: https://invideo.io/privacy-policy/

app.summary: Generate AI videos easily with a powerful AI video creator

reviews.text: I'm currently trying out the free version.. I made a nine minute video. and it was great. I feel for the price it could be a little better maybe offer a little more but ultimately I'm happy with the free version and I'm thinking about purchasing the yearly subscription. but before I make my decision I think there's a few questions that need to be answered. for instance the $240 a year subscription says you get 50 minutes.. but what does that mean per week per month? once I figure that out

This is a great app for video content generation. I would say 5 stars if I was able to edit the caption font/color/style, more voice selections, place my videos where I would like(always starts at the beginning). I paid for this app to take the water marks out and Am pleased with the quality..I would be Raving about this app if I could fine tune it better.

This app is amazing! Whatever you can think of this app can visually bring to life. From the voiceovers to the music and themes. I have truly created some utterly amazing nonsense and I'm having a blast with it. The only issue I have, is the constant buffering. Despite having a great internet connection, it continues to buffer. I have to tap different resolutions to keep the video playing. It's annoying but doesn't stop me from having fun.

This has been so much fun. A great combination of text, image and great video generations. Running from PC is way faster. Price will now be my next step. Could this be one of those Gems? Nice job Invideo. UPDATE...After 3 weeks testing. PRICE..on a fixed income, retired hobbyist I'd buy this but just to pricie as subscription. This was almost an old Shareware. You get 10 minutes of video generation and where most apps would cut you off, but they let you finish the one you're working on. 6Star

First, most ai video apps won't even LET you TRY it without at least a free trial that automatically charges you at the end of their 3-7 days. Not so with Invideo AI! The only way this app might dissapoint is that it doesn't produce exactly what you say in the prompt. It does, however, create a short documentary ABOUT what you say, and it'll even deepdive some research without you telling it about it. It's really impressive. Give it a shot!

It does a great job of story telling or making informational videos with stock photos and videos related to the audio. As for generating videos from scene prompts it cant really do that from what i can tell. I love that the free version actually lets you make an actual downloadable sample, without committing to something you dont want. I highly recommend trying this App!

Deceptive unhelpful and a huge waste of money. Worst of all, I can get no one to help me get even a partial refund after I cancel 1 month into a year subscription. Very disappointing. I can't believe they can simple ignore customers this way. Oh, and the main reason I'm canceling, is because after only 4! Videos and a $300 subscription, they said I was at my max! What am I paying for?

This is really awesome and I've enjoyed playing around with the free version. The only issue I have is the pricing... These are so expensive, that you basically already have to be making an income as a content creator to justify the cost investment, or, you have to at least be doing very well for yourself in order to pay these kinds of costs... It's like the Lincoln Park lyrics "I got so close and yet so far!" I would totally use the premium version if it didn't cost an arm and a leg.

Great idea, bad execution. Free gives you 2 vids. However, output results in long, wordy videos. Its algorithm learning curve is steep: fails count against you, not the program. If it can't execute your input after 5 attempts, and w/o publishing, oh well! Try next month! For pro, you get double the credits for fails, I guess?How does that make sense? Accepted, saved videos should be counted as credits. Why should I pay for its learning curve, get nothing? Repeated images, long loading times

Don't use this app, there are other apps like shotcut that are better, the only thing this app is good for is putting words to royalty-free pictures that can be found online. It often uses the same pictures and there are limits to how many videos you can export. You have to export some videos because the preview barely works. Worst app ever, saves you like maybe 30 seconds making a project and with the processing times, you're better off just doing it yourself. Buyer beware!!!
reviews.replyText: We're sorry for your experience. Usage limits are on our pricing page. For refunds, check Play Store subscription settings. We're improving the preview feature. For help, contact support@invideo.io. Join our Discord for updates: https://discord.gg/invideo-ai. We appreciate your feedback and are working to enhance the app.

app.developerLegalAddress: 16192 Coastal Hwy, Lewes, DE 19958, United States

You can also add a flair of generative to your stock media videos to make them a lot better. Get a glimpse of what you can create here: https://invideo.io/ai-videos/

What's new:

app.AIReview:
invideo AI: Video Generator ‚Äì A Comprehensive Review

Overview

invideo AI is positioned as a straightforward solution for anyone wanting to generate videos quickly using artificial intelligence. With over 4.6 million installs and a robust 4.37 rating, it‚Äôs clear that this app taps into a significant demand for simplified video creation tools. The core promise ‚Äì transforming ideas into engaging videos with minimal effort ‚Äì is attractive, particularly for users lacking extensive video editing experience or dedicated budgets. The ‚Äòfree‚Äô price point further fuels its accessibility, although the description emphasizes an AI-powered service, it's crucial to understand the limitations and potential costs associated with utilizing that power effectively. The app falls squarely into the Video Players & Editors category, competing with established names while attempting to differentiate itself through its AI focus.

Key Features

The app‚Äôs functionality centers around its ‚ÄúText to Video AI‚Äù feature ‚Äì a core selling point. Let's break down the key components:

  • Text-to-Video Generation: Users input a textual idea, and the AI generates a complete video based on it. This includes a script, voiceover (utilizing AI voices), relevant media clips, and text overlays.
  • AI Voiceovers: The app provides access to various AI voice actors with different accents and tones, allowing for professional-sounding narration without requiring human vocal talent. Users can adjust the speed and pitch of these generated voices.
  • Media Library Integration: The app boasts an integrated media library offering royalty-free stock footage and images that can be incorporated into generated videos. This avoids potential copyright issues often encountered when sourcing external video assets.
  • Template Library: While primarily focused on AI generation, the app offers a selection of pre-designed templates which users can then customize with their own text, voiceovers and media.
  • Customization Options: Users have control over various elements within generated videos: script length, pacing, transitions, music tracks (also royalty-free), and text styles. The ability to ‚Äúfine-tune any element‚Äù is a key differentiator highlighted in the description.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: The app‚Äôs primary strength lies in its intuitive interface. The "Text to Video" feature truly does deliver on its promise of simplicity. It requires minimal technical skill, making it accessible to beginners and marketers seeking rapid content creation.
  • Speed of Generation: The AI engine clearly demonstrates impressive speed. Generating a basic video from a simple text prompt can take just seconds ‚Äì significantly faster than traditional video editing workflows.
  • Cost-Effective (Initially): The free version offers substantial functionality, allowing users to experiment with the AI features and generate a reasonable number of videos before needing to upgrade.
  • Royalty-Free Assets: The integrated media library provides access to high-quality stock footage and images without worrying about licensing restrictions.

Areas for Improvement

  • Output Quality Variability: While generally good, the quality of generated videos can vary significantly depending on the complexity of the input text prompt. More nuanced or detailed prompts tend to yield better results. The app needs further refinement to consistently deliver polished professional-looking videos across a broader range of subjects.
  • Limited Control Over AI Choices: Currently, users have limited control over how the AI generates the video. There's no way to steer the AI towards specific visual styles or media types beyond selecting from within the library. This can lead to outputs that aren‚Äôt perfectly aligned with a user‚Äôs vision.
  • Voiceover Quality (Refinement Needed): Although AI voiceovers are available, they sometimes exhibit robotic qualities and lack natural inflection. Improvements in voice synthesis technology are crucial for enhancing this feature.
  • Template Customization Restrictions: While templates offer a starting point, the level of customization within those templates feels somewhat constrained compared to a full-fledged video editor.

User Experience

The user interface is clean and modern, with a focus on guiding users through the video creation process step-by-step. The workflow for generating a video is remarkably straightforward: enter your text prompt, select desired voiceover, choose media (or use the AI to source it), and then refine the output. The app‚Äôs onboarding process effectively introduces users to the core features without overwhelming them with options. Navigation is intuitive, and the drag-and-drop interface for arranging video elements is user-friendly. However, some advanced customization options are buried within menus, which could benefit from a more streamlined design. The responsiveness of the app on various devices (tested on both iOS and Android) was generally good, although occasional lag was observed during complex AI processing.

Value for Money

The free version provides significant value, allowing users to experiment with the core ‚ÄúText to Video‚Äù functionality and generate several videos before encountering limitations (such as daily video generation limits). The paid subscription tiers unlock higher video generation limits, access to premium media assets, advanced editing features, and priority support. Pricing details are not prominently displayed within the app, requiring users to navigate to a separate website to explore subscription options ‚Äì this could be improved for user convenience. At present, the value proposition is strong for casual users or individuals needing quick video content. However, professional videographers seeking complete control over every aspect of their creations may find limitations in the free version and potentially require a higher-tier subscription.

Conclusion

invideo AI: Video Generator represents a significant step forward in simplifying video creation using artificial intelligence. Its ease of use, speed of generation, and cost-effective entry point make it an attractive option for beginners and marketers seeking to quickly produce engaging videos. However, users should be aware of the variability in output quality, limited control over AI choices, and potential robotic qualities of the AI voiceovers. With ongoing refinements to its AI engine and a continued focus on user experience improvements, invideo AI has the potential to become an indispensable tool for anyone looking to effortlessly transform ideas into captivating videos. The app's high install count reflects its appeal, suggesting that it‚Äôs fulfilling a genuine need in the rapidly evolving landscape of digital content creation.
